WorkItem.ClosedComment: New process works a lot faster so there is far less of a need to pause/resume it. Also the error messages have been moved to the Error Tab while it continues processing, no longer needs user input to keep moving.
WorkItem.Description: It's a long process, yes.  Could it take note of the issues instead of stopping for user input before it continues?

Comments.Message: I've made a multithreaded version of the Item Cache updater. If Astrylian gives the green light, I'll check it in. It will also be more friendly with issues.

Oh, Multithreaded means "faster". Instead of downloading one by one, it will download a lot more (max, depends a bit on your operating system and your internet connection and stuff like that) at a time.
